sentences.english: We treated Mom to lunch at the Marriot.
sentences.chinese: 我们在万豪酒店请妈妈请吃午饭。
万豪酒店跟达美航空的呢？

sentences.english: Mr. Rauf Malik is the General Manager of Beijing Marriott Hotel City Wall?True or False?
sentences.chinese: 马立祺先生是北京万豪酒店的总经理，对不对？

sentences.english: Our conference will once again be held at the Toronto Airport Marriott Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我们的会议将再一次在多伦多机场举行万豪酒店。

sentences.english: Then we visit the Marriott Hotel, where we chill in the swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 接下来我们去参观了万豪酒店，在游泳池里冻得打颤。

sentences.english: We stayed 6 nights in Marriott Resort&Spa before continuing to Southern Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 我们在泰国南部的万豪酒店留宿了6天。

sentences.english: We'll be at the downtown International Marriott.
sentences.chinese: 我们会住在市中心的万豪国际酒店。

sentences.english: Which position does Ms. Ivy Liang hold in Beijing Marriott Hotel City Wall?
sentences.chinese: 北京万豪酒店梁爱卿女士的职位是什么？

sentences.english: They need the strength of Marriott.
sentences.chinese: 这些酒店需要万豪的力量。

sentences.english: And they helped us with our rewards program as well.
sentences.chinese: 同时，万豪在奖励计划方面也为我们提供了帮助。

sentences.english: It even launched the Marriott hotels around the world.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至还推出了世界各地的万豪酒店。

sentences.english: How long has Mr. Juergen Sterkau been working with the Marriott International?
sentences.chinese: 约根“施德考先生在万豪国际工作了多少年？

sentences.english: Welcome to the new Courtyard by Marriott Phuket at Surin Beach Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到位于普吉岛苏林海滩的万豪庭院酒店。

sentences.english: People first - the foundation of Marriott's success for over 75 years!
sentences.chinese: 以人为先是万豪集团成功运营超过75年的基础所在。

definition: Delta Air Lines, Inc., airline headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia

to take down from the shelves (e.g. a contaminated product)
Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
airline (abbr. for 航空公司[hang2 kong1 gong1 si1])
Uber, app-based taxi company founded in 2009
